misc: Might have trouble getting to the tee on time
biography: Jaakko is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing his home club of Hirsala Golf with distinction. Known for his discerning palate as a wine connoisseur, Jaakko brings a unique blend of sophistication and competitive spirit to the greens.

While he might occasionally test the patience of his teammates with his punctuality, Jaakko's dedication to the game is beyond reproach. With three past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Jaakko is eager to make his mark on the tournament.
As he prepares for Hector Trophée 2025, it will be his fourth appearance, Jaakko remains focused on the challenge ahead, hoping to leverage his experience and passion for golf to achieve success.
